title: Which accommodation will be better in St. Antony's Public School, Anakkal hostel: a single bedroom or a four-bedded room? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, that entirely depends on the kinda guy you are. But trying to adjust with 3/4 people around will surely be a future asset for you. And if you are really a lonebookworm, it's better to go for a single. Caz you won't be left with much time to go for experiments in adjusting with the new situations…ALL THE BEST!
